body:
yesterday wasn't as bad as i had envisioned

it's fucking friday thank god

poke delivery for dinner and miso's joy in licking out our containers when we finished 

falling asleep watching a movie (_dark phoenix_, which was fine) with my head in d's lap

even though my sinuses were clogged during the night, i still slept pretty well

forgot to get sinus meds at the pharmacy, but did pick up my prozac

there was just enough milk left for this morning's oatmeal
